tab_portalsetting_sticky_menu_note: This setting only applies to the top menu of the site and is disabled for both mobile and tablet views.
tab_portalsetting_favicon_note: Make sure that your image has the following dimensions: 16 x 16 or 32 x 32.
tab_portalsetting_Website_load_icon_enab: Enable or disable the loader overlay from displaying.
tab_portalsetting_load_icon_blog_link_en: To disable Page Loader please follow the instructions here.
tab_portalsetting_load_icon_blog_link_di: To enable Page Loader please follow the instructions here.
tab_portalsetting_load_icon_note: Upload a page loader image, the image will be adjusted to have a height of 100px. The uploaded image will have priority over the selected icon.
tab_portalsetting_load_icon_class_note: Choose a predefined load screen icon, which will be used if there is no page loader image.
tab_portalsetting_logo_note: Make sure that your image has the following dimensions of 320 x 80 for optimum quality and retina displays.
tab_portalsetting_top_banner_notes: You can set which banner media will be used by choosing either the image/video tab.
tab_portalsetting_top_banner_video_img_t: This image will only display on the mobile/tablet version of the Home Page.
tab_portalsetting_Theme_Color_note: Choose between the preset theme colors for different elements of the site.
tab_portalsetting_Force_User_Re_note: Allows user to register with the same email multiple times. Please note that this will create duplicate accounts and randomizes the email. Example: jondoe+123@gmail.com.
tab_portalsetting_Case_Insensitive_Campa: This enables the case insensitivity for the campaign urls. Example, /campaign and /CaMpAiGn will be treated as the same URL otherwise it is different.
tab_portalsetting_Enable_Case_Insensitiv: Enable Case Insensitive Campaign Path Lookup
tab_portalsetting_auto_approve_user_note: Enabling this option will auto approve the user upon registering.
tab_portalsetting_auto_approve_campaign_: Enabling this option will auto approve newly created campaigns.
tab_portalsetting_Campaign_Custom_uri_no: Enables the customization of your campaign URL.
tab_portalsetting_Campaign_hide_creator_: This will hide the campaign creator information except the Contact Button in the top right corner on the campaign pages.
tab_portalsetting_Website_Company_note: Customize your website name to suit your needs. Please note that this will not affect the url of your site.
tab_portalsetting_payment_setting_enable: This option allows you to disable or enable the payment processing via selected payment gateway.
tab_portalsetting_payment_setting_note: Choose which payment gateway will be used for processing payments on the site.
tab_portalsetting_Website_Menu_note: Manage your website navigation and footer links. You can also create a custom url link.
tab_portalsetting_terms_policy_note: Choose where you want the Terms of Service and Privacy Policy agreement will be displayed.
tab_portalsetting_post_processing_note: Specify the days to give enough time for project creators to determine the fate of the campaign and also allows the backers to re-submit credit card information to ensure higher success rates.
tab_portalsetting_Category_display_note: Control the display of your campaigns categories
tab_portalsetting_No_Campaign_message_no: Customize the text for your no campaign message.
tab_portalsetting_Campaign_Display_note: Enabling this option allows you to show campaigns.
tab_portalsetting_Decimal_Option_notes: Change decimal notation throughout the whole site.
tab_portalsetting_Allow_Decimal_notes: Checking this will enable decimal notation for contributions
tab_portalsetting_Hide_Decimal: Hide Decimal Notation from all Amounts
tab_portalsetting_Hide_Decimal_notes: Checking this will hide decimal notation for all Amounts throughout the site
tab_portalsetting_Exclude_Shipping_notes: Checking this will exclude the shipping cost from the Funded Amounts.
tab_portalsetting_HomePage_Content_note: You can customize text of the home page or by using html block you will be able to customize that whole section to suit your needs.
tab_portalsetting_Default_Font: Default Lato, Helvetica Neue, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif
tab_portalsetting_Middle_Banner_Default_: Default Lato, Helvetica Neue, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif
tab_portalsetting_Bottom_Banner_Default_: Default Lato, Helvetica Neue, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif
tab_portalsetting_Explore_PageContent_no: Customize the explore banner text or use the html block to fully customize this section.
tab_portalsetting_Explore_homebanner_set: Use Home Page Main Banner Setting
tab_portalsetting_FooterContent_note: Modify the social media header text.
tab_portalsetting_SocialMedia_links_note: Add your social media links and if nothing is specified the social media section will not be displayed.
tab_portalsetting_advanced_widget_note: This setting enables or disables the Advanced CrowdFunding Widget which allows project creators to host campaigns or projects directly on their own website. You can read more about it here.
tab_portalsetting_Mail_SendFrom_note: This email will be used when sending out emails or notifications.
tab_portalsetting_Mail_Admin_note: This email is used when receiving email notifications for the site.
tab_portalsetting_Campaign_RaiseMode_not: Keep it all - Keep all the funds contributed even if the goal isn't met. All or nothing - Keep the funds contributed if the funded goal is met.
tab_portalsetting_Campaign_RaiseMode_dir: Direct charges get processed immediately without any delays. This also means that project or campaign creator needs to be handling refunds manually.
tab_portalsetting_Campaign_RaiseMode_pos: Post charges will process all contributions after campaign has ended. It will first pre-authorize all credit card used for contributions and then allow for those that failed to be re-tried.
tab_portalsetting_Contribution_behaviour: Choose the display whether guests or non-registered users are allowed to contribute.
tab_portalsetting_WebAnalytics_descripti: This field is for generic website footer code. It will be triggered on every page of the website. This can for example be used for Website Analytics or other Website Widgets and Tools. Simply paste your code snippets here.
tab_portalsetting_WebAnalytics_placehold: Add your website analytics code here
tab_portalsetting_Stripesetting_message: You will need to create Stripe application in the Stripe under 'Your Account -> Account Settings -> Apps'. After this is done you will be able to find your Stripe client_id there. Your secret_key and publishable_key are available under 'Your Account -> Account Settings -> API Keys'. Please copy the three values including client_id, secret_key and publishable_key from Stripe to fields below to finalize your Stripe application setup. For more detailed instructions please click here.
tab_portalsetting_Stripesetting_transact: You can specify the transaction percentage fee for payments. Enabling the direct transactions will force the fee to 100%.
tab_portalsetting_Stripesetting_ClientId: Copy your client_id in your account settings under the connect tab.
Please paste your client id here
tab_portalsetting_Stripesetting_SecretKe: Copy your Secret Key in your account settings under the API keys tab.
Please paste your secret key here
tab_portalsetting_Stripesetting_Publishk: Copy your Publishable Key in your account settings under the API keys tab.
Please paste your publishable key here
tab_portalsetting_Stripesetting_Account_: Select your default country for transactions.
tab_portalsetting_Stripesetting_currency: Select your campaign currency for transactions.
tab_portalsetting_Stripesetting_Redirect: Copy URL below and paste it into your Stripe application under Redirect URIs
This URL will be used to redirect your users back to after they connect with Stripe.
tab_portalsetting_Disqus_choose_comment_: Choose between the disqus plugin or the custom commenting system.
tab_portalsetting_Disqus_display_user_pi: This allows the user's photos to be displayed on the comments.
tab_portalsetting_Disqus_auto_refresh_de: This will automatically refresh and retrieve new comments every 60 seconds.
tab_portalsetting_comment_anonymous_comm: This option lets you configure whether anonymous comment posts and anonymous comment actions are allowed and which users can use these options
tab_portalsetting_comment_settings_note: Customize the theme of the comment system.
tab_portalsetting_Disqus_message3: . Once done, copy the website shortname and paste it below. Shortname is the Disqus URL without .disqus.com suffix.
tab_portalsetting_widget_settings_note: Choose your widget to configure the settings.
tab_portalsetting_Contactform_placeholde: Please enter the contact form receiver email address
tab_portalsetting_Wordpress_Url_note: To enable the wordpress you need to have the API URL.
tab_portalsetting_Display_footer_note: Allow the widget to display on the footer.
tab_portalsetting_Twitter_Code_note: Paste the twitter widget code that is taken from your twitter account settings.
tab_portalsetting_campaign_minimum_butto: This controls the display of the contribute button in your campaign as well as the minimum charge. You can set the minimum or maximum contribution charge to suit your needs.
tab_portalsetting_campaign_show_date_not: This controls the display of the start date on the campaign page.
tab_portalsetting_campaign_display_iso_d: This enables your campaign dates to be formatted differently. Example, If this is enabled your date format will be 2016/05/13 otherwise its May 13 2016.
tab_portalsetting_campaign_enable_past_d: Allow Admin to Set Past Campaign Dates
This option allows website admin to set dates for campaign in the past when editing the project.
tab_portalsetting_campaign_allow_video_t: This option allows for video thumbnail to be uploaded during campaign creation process and played in place of campaign image thumbnail.
tab_portalsetting_campaign_alt_shipping_: This controls alternate shipping Layouts for Japanese and some international markets. The shipping fields will change as well as the input languages.
Enable Alternate Shipping Layout for Campaigns
tab_portalsetting_campaign_default_shipp: This will be your default shipping country for your campaign.
tab_portalsetting_campaign_shipping_nati: This option is currently only available for Japanese users. DO NOT check this option unless you reside in Japan.
tab_portalsetting_Stripesetting_stripe_m: Toggle test mode for development use and testing purposes for transactions. Toggle live mode once you are done with testing and ready to go.
tab_portalsetting_company_phone_placehol: Enter your optional company phone number
tab_portalsetting_campaign_show_progress: The campaign progress details will show the backer info, the total funded amount, total percent funded and the progress bar.
tab_portalsetting_faq_tab_option1: Show FAQ tab if there is at least 1 or more FAQs
tab_portalsetting_faq_tab_option2: Always show FAQ tab even with 0 FAQs
tab_portalsetting_backers_tab_option1: Show backers tab if there is at least 1 or more backers
tab_portalsetting_backers_tab_option2: Always show backers tab even with 0 backers
tab_portalsetting_backers_tab_option4: Hide Backers For Non Admin or Project Creator User
tab_portalsetting_comments_tab_option1: Always show comments tab even with 0 comments
tab_portalsetting_streams_tab_option1: Show stream tab if there is at least 1 or more streams
tab_portalsetting_streams_tab_option2: Always show stream tab even with 0 streams
stripe_token_message: These are optional fields used to pre-fill the form during Stripe connect workflow.
title_too_long: Link title is too long for header menu.
too_many_links: Too many links for header menu.
footer_title_long: Link title is too long for footer menu.
allow_both: Allow Both Registered User and Guest Contributions
tab_portalsetting_stripeerror_msg: Please note that your Stripe credentials have been updated. This may affect your previously created campaigns and cause them not to function anymore. Press OK if you are certain you want to proceed with this action.
tab_portalsetting_direct_transaction_mes: This will force all campaign contributions to go 100% to main portal account. Read more here.
Show FAQ tab if there is at least 1 or m: Show FAQ tab if there is at least 1 or more FAQs
Always show FAQ tab even with 0 FAQs: Always show FAQ tab even with 0 FAQs
Show backers tab if there is at least 1: Show backers tab if there is at least 1 or more backers
Always show backers tab even with 0 back: Always show backers tab even with 0 backers
Hide Backers For Non Admin or Project Cr: Hide Backers For Non Admin or Project Creator Users
Show comments tab if there is at least 1: Show comments tab if there is at least 1 or more comments
Always show comments tab even with 0 com: Always show comments tab even with 0 comments
Show stream tab if there is at least 1 o: Show update tab if there is at least 1 or more updates
Always show stream tab even with 0 strea: Always show update tab even with 0 updates
tab_portalsetting_tab_option_campaign_pa: Choose your display options for the campaign tabs.
tab_portalsetting_campaign_reward_text_n: Controls the display of the reward. You have the choice to show or hide rewards to suit your needs.
tab_portalsetting_campaign_percentage_no: Overrides the default transaction percentage fee for each campaigns.
tab_portalsetting_campaign_percentage_al: Allow project creator to set campaign percentage fee
tab_portalsetting_campaign_keep_campaign: This option when enabled allows the campaign to remain in approved status even when being edited, i.e. campaign status will not revert to being edited.
tab_portalsetting_campaign_campaign_alwa: This option will force capture of funds in post processing mode even if there are failed pledges on campaign.
tab_portalsetting_campaign_group_managem: Allows regular users to manage campaigns.
tab_portalsetting_campaign_always_anonym: Force all contributions to be anonymous by default
tab_portalsetting_campaign_private_help: This allows users to set campaigns as private, meaning they can only be accessed via special randomly generated URL. Note that website administrator and campaign manager can still access campaign in a regular way.
tab_portalsetting_campaign_content_sugge: Optional endpoint which provides content suggestions for certain campaign creation fields. Currently only campaign blurb, description and FAQ field content can be suggested.
tab_portalsetting_campaign_restrict_hint: This option restricts campaign creation and management to website administrator only.
tab_portalsetting_campaign_delayed_fundi: Hide funding step from campaign creation until campaign is approved.
tab_portalsetting_campaign_contribution_: This toggles whether online campaign contributions are enabled or disabled. This is for cases where you only want to process contributions offline via manual transaction interface.
tab_portalsetting_campaign_percentage_en: Enable Per Campaign Transaction Percentage Fee
tab_portalsetting_Website_logo_link_mess: The logo link can be an external website URL or internal relative path.
tab_portalsetting_Website_logo_Placehold: Please enter the url where your logo will link to
tab_portalsetting_campaign_rewards_html_: Allows users to use the Text Editor to customize font styles, code, & etc.
tab_portalsetting_custom_fields_for_note: You can additionally add custom fields that are needed for profiles.
tab_portalsetting_Campaign_Cuntinuous_Ru: Please note that continuous campaigns run in direct charge KiA raise mode only.
tab_portalsetting_site_notify_admin_all_: The administrator will receive notifications of any contrbutions sent to campaigns.
Notify Website Administrator for all Campaign Contributions
tab_portalsetting_site_auth_scheme_note: Select which backend authentication scheme will be used. This is for legacy compatibility when importing users into the system and need to use a specific method to authenticate.
tab_portalsetting_site_disable_account_s: This will disable the 'Account Settings' tab under Profile Settings.
tab_portalsetting_site_enable_person_att: Allow Non-Admin To Manage Person Attributes
Allow non-admin users to view and edit person attributes.
tab_portalsetting_site_enable_site_perso: Enable public user search and message composition
This option enables public user search by name and also allows for new message composition.
tab_portalsetting_site_redirect_login_li: These options are for changing the Login and Registration Blocks on the login/register page. You can replace such blocks with link buttons for example. NOTE: By adjusting these settings you may disable regular login.
tab_portalsetting_select_raise_mode_erro: Please select at least one raise mode
